title: Ep 68: The Magic Wand with Kate Baer

description:
New York Times bestselling author Kate Baer is BACK. Last time she made waves with the Garden Witch Overalls and this time she brought The Magic Wand with her. Caroline bought it MID-EPISODE RECORDING and can confirm: Magic. Also, they read the many many 5-star reviews of The Magic Wand (“I met Jesus”) and laugh and laugh and laugh and la—


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • What Kind Of Woman by Kate Baer: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780063008427 
  • The Magic Wand: https://amzn.to/38VHO4Q
  • The Garden Witch Overalls: https://amzn.to/3lse0C7
